attributes.action: Introduce law to make it illegal for a judge to be appointed to chair a public or judicial inquiry.
attributes.additional_details: People have been saying it for years and Leeveson has recently demonstrated most superbly over the phone hacking scandal, that our judges, like our politicians, are just, well, FOR SALE and BUYABLE, and must be kept a long way away from any dealings over matters where the tax paying public wants a, well, just HONEST outcome.
